## Configuration List
| Field Name | Default | Required | 
|---|---|:---:|
| APP_ADDRESS | :8089 | Yes |
| APP_READ_TIMEOUT | 5s |  |
| APP_WRITE_TIMEOUT | 10s |  |
| APP_DEBUG | true |  |

## DotEnv example
```
APP_ADDRESS=:8089
APP_READ_TIMEOUT=5s
APP_WRITE_TIMEOUT=10s
APP_DEBUG=true
```
